contributionsleaderboard-desc: Displays a leaderboard of wiki contributors based on edit counts
contributionsleaderboard-intro: This page shows the most active contributors to the wiki based on edit counts.
contributionsleaderboard-database-error: There was an error retrieving data from the database.
contributionsleaderboard-scoring-explana:
The contribution score is calculated using a weighted system that values different types of contributions:
* Creating a new page: 10 points
* Large edit (over 1000 bytes): 5 points
* Medium edit (100-1000 bytes): 3 points
* Small edit (under 100 bytes): 1 point

Additional multipliers are applied based on content type:
* JavaScript and CSS edits: 1.3x
* JSON edits: 1.2x
* Wiki text edits: 1.0x
* Plain text edits: 0.8x
